data.text: @ClayTravis This is from FEMA- it’s discussing a household member who has radiation poisoning and the importance of maintaining 6 ft distance from that person.  And yes, even wearing a mask is important.  Radiation poisoning can pass to others, similarly to someone receiving chemo-
